notes_filename: This is the excel file with the list of all tournaments
notes_template: This is the template OJS that will be copied into each of the tournament folders (after being modified for each tournament)
notes_copy_file_lists: Files to copy into tournament folders. Common files are always copied. Division-specific files are copied based on using_divisions setting. Each entry maps source filename to destination filename.
notes_tournament_folder: IMPORTANT: Set this to the folder where you want all tournament folders to be created. Use forward slashes (/) for paths on ALL platforms (Windows, Mac, Linux). The folder will be created automatically if it doesn't exist. Examples: Windows: 'C:/tournaments' or 'C:/Users/YourName/Documents/tournaments', Mac/Linux: '/Users/YourName/tournaments'
